name: prisoners_dilemma_experiment
query: Two prisoners, Alice and Bob, are arrested for a crime. They are held in separate cells and cannot communicate. Each prisoner must decide whether to cooperate with the other by remaining silent or defect by betraying the other. If both cooperate, they each serve 1 year. If both defect, they each serve 2 years. If one defects and the other cooperates, the defector goes free and the cooperator serves 3 years. Simulate this scenario.

outcomes.name: both_cooperate
outcomes.condition: Both prisoners choose to cooperate and remain silent, resulting in equal outcomes of 1 year each
outcomes.description: Both prisoners serve 1 year in prison

outcomes.name: both_defect
outcomes.condition: Both prisoners choose to defect and betray each other, resulting in equal outcomes of 2 years each
outcomes.description: Both prisoners serve 2 years in prison

outcomes.name: alice_defects_bob_cooperates
outcomes.condition: Alice defects while Bob cooperates, resulting in Alice going free and Bob serving 3 years
outcomes.description: Alice goes free while Bob serves 3 years

outcomes.name: bob_defects_alice_cooperates
outcomes.condition: Bob defects while Alice cooperates, resulting in Bob going free and Alice serving 3 years
outcomes.description: Bob goes free while Alice serves 3 years
